long_description: The Continental Travel Contact cross-hybrid tires are large in volume and feature a semi-slick tread that's versatile on and off the road. Puncture-resistance system protects the casing and inner tube from thorns, glass and debris. Endless Edge(TM) technology features specifically shaped knobs with 5 edges and 5 corners for superior handling in all conditions.
short_description: The Continental Travel Contact cross-hybrid tires are large in volume and feature a semi-slick tread that's versatile on and off the road.
